text: kmean kar sangsay laey pitabrakd nasa avei del mean now leumekh cheachraen chean ning phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . trong pitchea doeng nouv avei del puok anak br pru td vea ning( trong doeng) now thngai del puokke nung trauv vilotralb towkean trong vinh . haey trong nung brab puokke aoy doeng nouv avei del puokke ban br pru td( nowknong lokey nih) . haey a l laoh mha doeng nouv real avei teangoasa
